title: Strengthening Customer Service Practice Competencies: Collaborative Microlearning for Scientific Information Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational understanding of science learning
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate various scientific information sources and identify credible ones with 80% accuracy.
Through collaborative research activities, learners can design and implement a process for applying scientific information to real-life contexts in three or more stages.
Using mobile learning tools, learners can share information experiences with peers and achieve a peer feedback incorporation rate of over 70%.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
